attributes.action: BAN ALL FORMS OF ANTI ISLAMIC AND ANTI RELIGIOUS MEDIA THAT SPREADS HATRED AND ATTACKS ON ANY FAITH
attributes.additional_details:
If you attack someone because of their colour, its racism! Too right!
If you attack someone because of their gender, its sexism! Too right!
If you attack someone because of their disability, its discrimination! Too right!
If you attack someone because of their religion, its intolerance! Too right!
If you attack a country, its terrorism! Too right!
If you attack ISLAM, its Freedom of Expression !!!!!!!!

WE WISH THE GOVERNMENT TO BAN AND  MAKE IT AN OFFENCE TO PUBLISH IN ANY MEDIA ANY FORM OF RELIGIOUS HATRED OR ATTACKS ON A RELIGION  - FOR ALL RELIGIONS.
